SAYS: I thought the signing up process was really quite easy.
I mostly have been using the app.
My only challenge with the app was when there was something that I couldn't do, I couldn't figure out how to tell the committee chair that I wouldn't be there.
I think the filtering of events would be nice on the app and the website.
I felt like it's generally been super user friendly.
THINKS: I hope the website and app are easy to navigate for other newcomers.
People might not care about reading the fine print when signing up.
The overwhelming amount of events might deter some members from participating.
I need to find a way to contact the committee chair easily when I can't attend an event.
I wish there was a better way to filter events based on my interests.
DOES: Joined the club and attended the orientation and meet and greet.
Primarily uses the app to navigate events and activities.
Scrolls through events to find relevant activities.
Contacts committee chairs through email if necessary.
Checks member information and governing documents on the website.
FEELS: Feels relieved that the sign-up process was easy.
Experiences frustration when unable to contact committee chairs.
Feels overwhelmed by the number of events available.
Expresses a sense of appreciation for the organization and its structure.
Shows a desire for improvement in the app's functionality and aesthetics.
